panels.description: Sum of all validator balances.

panels.description: Total BOA return on the initial effective stake of active local validators.
panels.title: Total Earnings (BOA)

panels.description: Total percentage return on the initial effective stake of active local validators. Excess deposits will be reflected as earnings.
panels.title: Total Return

panels.description: The number of peers

panels.description: The percentage of BOA balances expected to attest that are actually attesting.
panels.title: Participation Rate

panels.description: A metric expressing the distance between the current finalized epoch and the expected finalized epoch based on the genesis time. 100% means the expected and current finalized epochs are the same. The metric reaches 0% when the finalized epoch is 25 epochs behind the expected epoch.
panels.title: Network Liveness

panels.description: The percentage of BOA balances expected to attest that are actually attesting.
panels.title: Participation Rate

panels.description: Basic CPU info

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node-exporter", mode="system"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node-exporter"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node-exporter", mode="user"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node-exporter"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node-exporter", mode="iowait"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node-exporter"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node-exporter", mode=~".*irq"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{job="node-exporter"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode!='idle',mode!='user',mode!='system',mode!='iowait',mode!='irq',mode!='softirq'}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="idle"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: CPU

panels.description: Basic memory usage

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

panels.title: Memory Usage
